activities: We occasionally send interactive direct marketing campaigns to individuals in these regions.  These campaigns are typically B2B in nature.  The information we gather on the targets is typically limited to Name, Business Address, Email Address and Phone Number, and are used exclusively to execute targeted marketing campaigns for our Clients.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal data would include the name and postal addresses of individuals that are included in direct mail campaigns.
recoursemech: Individuals may file claims with TRUSTe
